meanings.definition: A person who endorses a document or contract.
meanings.sent1: The indorsees signed the agreement to show their support.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer explained the rights of the indorsees in the contract.
meanings.sent3: The indorsees were so excited to put their names on the official paper.
meanings.sent4: As indorsees of the petition, they stood united in their cause.
meanings.sent5: The indorsees' signatures were crucial for the document to be valid.

meanings.definition: The recipient of an endorsement on a check or other negotiable instrument.
meanings.sent1: The bank processed the check for the indorsees listed on it.
meanings.sent2: The indorsees were grateful for the financial support received.
meanings.sent3: The indorsees happily accepted the endorsed check with a smile.
meanings.sent4: As indorsees of the payment, they were entitled to the funds.
meanings.sent5: The indorsees eagerly awaited the arrival of the endorsed document.
